item.description:
Specific Topic: Shaking and Shaping Limiting Beliefs

Do you have limiting beliefs?  Do you ever feel or say, "I can't", "This won't work for me", or "This isn't possible"?  Do you find yoruself limiting yourself in areas where you have noticed that others don't?  We often have beliefs that limit our abilities or possibilities.  These beliefs have been shaped over time but can be changed, almost instantly.

Learn how you can change your beliefs with this simple NLP technique.

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

 

Kevin Martin
978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Natick - Shaking and Shaping Limiting Beliefs
